reviewText: Came on time and is perfect.
Thanks again for movie. The shaw brothers Kung fu movies are the greatest of all time.

Make no mistake, the movie is classic and I love it, but for that you have to be able to see it clearly. The picture quality is bad. Hope the remastered version pops up soon, as this Chor Yuen swordplay deserves.
This movie and the Return of the Sentimental Swordsman follow the same story line. The story took to long to develop. The fighting and effects were great for the age of the movie.
